SECTION_CONTENT:
This material is prepared for use as a standard or in inter-laboratory comparison programs at
analytical laboratories that routinely handle uranium and/or plutonium. The New Brunswick
Laboratory (NBL) assumes that recipients of this material have developed internal safety
procedures that guard against accidental exposure to radioactive and toxic materials, contamination
